pages.text: $(l)(Active-Offensive)/$$(br)Bombers are similar to $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/mortar)Mortars/$, with three differences: Their Length is longer, their Width is smaller and they can be countered by $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/anti_air)Anti-Air/$.

Be aware that if you select a tile too close to the edge of the board, the ability may target less tiles than its stats indicate.$(br2)$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(li)Bombers can be useful for scouting early on.$(li)When a bomber hits an $(l:abilities/passive/energy_shield)$(thing)Energy Shield/$, it will only deal one damage to the shield regardless of how much of the ability hits the shield.
$(li)A bomber will be nullified by Anti-Air if any of the selected tiles include an Anti-Air tile, even if the tiles that are actually targeted by the bomber don't include one.
